gameinterfaces

Interface Battle


  • public interface Battle
    A class that implements this interface should have the following attributes:
    • player: Player
    • monster: Monster
    The implementing class should only have the following constructor: public Battle(Player, Monster)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void run()
      This method will let player and monster battle against each other until one of them dies.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        void run()
        This method will let player and monster battle against each other until one of them dies. 1. At the beginning of the battle, display "Battle begins: (player name) vs. (monster name)". 2. Player turn: Display the hit points of player and monster. Ask user if they want to attack (a) or heal (h). Depending on user input, attack the monster or heal the player. Check if monster is killed. 3. Monster turn: Check if monster should be enraged this turn. Let monster attack the player. Check if the player is killed.
